channel.title: Puzzle on David Bieber
channel.description: Recent content in Puzzle on David Bieber

item.title: Escape Castle Heterodyne
item.description: We built an Escape Room! Serious props to Bianca Homberg and her amazing talented group of friends for making this happen. I was just a small piece of this epic endeavor. Bianca was the organizer and driving force for a really impressive piece of puzzle craftsmanship. The premise for the escape room is based on the webcomic Girl Genius. Here’s what you need to know: Escape Castle Heterodyne There’s a castle, Castle Heterodyne, which is a living, breathing, talking entity.

item.title: Life at KA: A Khanversation with David Bieber
item.description: Originally posted at life.khanacademy.org We’ll dive straight into the questions for our latest Khan Academy Khanversation, this time featuring rising Princeton senior David Bieber. David, let’s begin with the question everyone is dying to hear you answer. Are you related to Justin Bieber? It’s funny you should ask that. People tell me all the time “sorry about your last name” or “I hope you’re not related to that singer” or “can you get me free tickets to the Bieber concert?
